Translations.Text: Ini: "a yAt Tezmamt! Yyaw ar wawal azduklan garane$ yidwen. A naabed siwa Oebbi, ur aS nepcarak acemma; ur pparan, kra segne$ kra, d ioebbiten, war Oebbi". Ma wexxoen, init: "cehhdet ar nekwni d imvuaen
A yAt Tezmamt! Acimi temnamarem $ef Iboahim? Ur n risent Tuoa akked Linoil, armi deffir es, day ur tmeyyzem ara
Kunwi, atan temnamarem $ef wayen tessnem. Ihi, acimi temnamarem $ef wayen ur tessinem? Oebbi Issen, kunwi ur tessinem
Ur illi Iboahim d uday ne$ d amasiei, maca illa d amvua imalen ar tidep. Ur illi seg imcurak
Ih, imdanen iqeoben nezzeh ar Iboahim, war ccekk, d wid i t ivefoen, akked Nnbi agi, akked wid iumnen. Oebbi d Bab n lmumnin
Arbaa, seg At Tezmamt, ib$a a kwen itlef. Ara telfen siwa iman nnsen, ur eoin
A yAt Tezmamt! Acimi tugim issekniyen n Oebbi, u kunwi tepwalim
A yAt Tezmamt! Acimi teslusum, i tidep, ayen idensen, u teppeffrem tidep, kunwi teeuam
